description: Glimmer is a browser extension that supercharges your productivity by providing you with a suite of tools to help you focus, stay organized, and get things done.

features.title: Features
features.quickActionsDescription: Quickly access Google Search, ChatGPT, copy to clipboard, Perplexity just by highlighting text.
features.floatingMenuDescription: Floating menu that provides quick access to all the tools and configurations.
features.i18nDescription: Change the interface language to your preferred language.
features.themeDescription: Change the theme of the extension to light or dark mode.
